itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Gomer Llewelyn Gunn (third ¼ 1885 – fourth ¼ 1935) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for Welsh Schoolboys, and at club level for Treherbert RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Other Nationalities, and at club level for Bradford FC (now Bradford Park Avenue A.F.C.), Wigan and Keighley, as a fullback, or centre, i.e. number 1, or 3 or 4.

response: *Gomer Gunn (1885–1935), Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer
